RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Doutor em Gentica pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (2010). Tem experincia na rea de Gentica e Biotecnologia, atuando principalmente na rea de Gentica de Microrganismos.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: graduation at Licenciatura en Ciencias Biolgicas from Universidad Nacional de Mar del Plata (2000), master's at Genetics from Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (2006) and doctorate at Genetics from Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (2010). Has experience in Genetics, focusing on Genetics, acting on the following subjects: fermentao, leveduras, phmb, hog, cwi, yap1, yeast, stress response, protein kinase c and sulphuric acid.
